critique: The document aims to reassure veterans and their dependents that their compensation or pension will not be affected by the new act, except in specific cases. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is joy, as it provides relief and security to those who rely on these benefits. There might be some surprise due to the exception clauses, and a minimal amount of fear or sadness if the reader falls into those exception categories. Disgust and anger are unlikely to be elicited.
